fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle.Effect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Destruction, Heal, Swap

    public abstract class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    KAYRAK GERLAND Effect is an abstract class which gathers all the types of effect. An effect could represent a passive, a spell and an attack.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AGGRESSIVE
      0/aggressive/an effect which is applied on the enemy warrior
      static int DEFENSIVE
      1/defensive/an effect which is applied on the warrior played
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the effect
      private int speed
      The speed of the effect
      private boolean spell
      Is it the hero which will use the effect ?
      static int SWAP
      2/swap/an effect which allows to swap warrior played
      private int type
      The type of the effect

    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect(java.lang.String name,
      int speed,
      int type,
      boolean spell)
        This is the super constructor of all the Effects of the game. An Effect have a name, a speed, a type, and a boolean.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the effect
        speed - the speed of the effect
        type - the type of the spell (aggressive or not, swap ?)
        spell - spell or attack
